short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: uSync allows its users to build collections of content they are sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
uSync social network provides users with incredible features that connect them to content and people who they're specifically interested in. Collections are one of many powerful features that quickly link content that you find on the web. This extension enables users to sync images, movies and text to the collection of their choice with just a couple of clicks. 

Once synced, you can share your Collection(s) or use them privately for inspiration, reference, projects or collaborative work. It's convenient, safe and inspiring. The content you sync can be edited or deleted at any time within the uSync app.
